entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Proper name for the dark wizard, mentioned by Dumbledore as a way to reduce fear of him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Student at Hogwarts and main protagonist, mentioned in conversation with Dumbledore.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Person left to die by Voldemort, mentioned as an example of his mercy towards followers.

relationships.description: Harry fears Voldemort, and Dumbledore advises him to use the proper name for things to reduce fear.
Voldemort left Quirrell to die, as an example of his mercy towards followers.
